channel.title: CMD Box Freeze
channel.description: When I Run My server my cmd box just freeze any idea how to fix this? and if you know how i could exit it that would be nice to know also, thanks.

item.title: CMD Box Freeze
item.dc:creator: @soccerjunki21 soccerjunki21
item.description:
@soccerjunki21 wrote:

to exit it
hold
[size=12pt]Windows xp[/size]
ctrl+alt+del and right click on the cmd and click goto process and then click end process
[size=14pt]Windows 7[/size]
ctrl+alt+del and then click task manager and do the same for windows xp

and could you post what you see when you right click on run and click edit
and i could possibly help you

Read full topic
